title: Classifier
description: Classify data records/rows into the desired categories based on arbitrary data attributes.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Dataset containing the data records to process. Either an Apify dataset ID or a URL to a parquet file.

model.title: LLM Model
model.description: The LLM provider and model to be used for classification. Format: provider/model (e.g., 'openai/gpt-4', 'anthropic/claude-3-sonnet')

attrs.title: Record Attributes
attrs.description: List of record attributes/columns to use for classification. If null, all attributes are used. This allows focusing on specific fields in your data.

categories.title: Categories/Labels
categories.description: A mapping of category names to their descriptions. The model will classify records into these categories based on the provided attributes.

instructions.title: Additional Instructions
instructions.description: Additional use-case specific instructions or context for the classification. This helps the AI model understand your specific domain or requirements
